item.title: 美国加征关税，日本下调全球经济展望
item.description: 面对美国贸易政策的不确定性，日本政府周四下调了对全球经济的评估，这表明日本政府对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的影响不断扩大感到担忧。【原文：Japan's government on Thursday downgraded its assessment on the global economy in the face of uncertainty over U.S. trade policy, signalling its alarm over the broadening fallout from President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席执行官称 2025 年为 "清算之年
item.description: 德意志银行首席执行官克里斯蒂安-苏宁（Christian Sewing）在周四计划向股东发表的讲话中称 2025 年是 "清算之年"，股东们要求他提供有关德国最大贷款机构未来发展道路的详细信息。【原文：Deutsche Bank CEO Christian Sewing called 2025 a "year of reckoning" in remarks he planned to deliver on Thursday to shareholders demanding details on the path forward for Germany's largest lender.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行：尽管贸易战仍在继续，但澳大利亚出口商对中国商业前景持乐观态度
item.description: 澳大利亚央行的一位高级官员周四表示，澳大利亚出口商对在中国的业务前景持乐观态度，因为美国的关税可能会增强他们在中国市场的竞争优势。【原文：Australian exporters are upbeat on their business outlook in China as U.S. tariffs could enhance their competitive edge in Chinese markets, a top central bank official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 游戏延期动摇行业利润，《Embracer》倚重旧作
item.description: 古墓丽影》的所有者 Embracer 公司首席执行官拉尔斯-温格福斯（Lars Wingefors）周四表示，在 AAA 级游戏发行量减少的情况下，Embracer 公司正依靠其游戏目录来维持现金流，但这并不是一个长期的转变。【原文：Tomb Raider owner Embracer is leaning on its back catalogue to maintain cash flow while fewer AAA games are being released, but this is not a long-term shift, CEO Lars Wingefors said on Thursday.】

item.title: 韩国准备支持食品出口商抵御美国关税
item.description: 韩国财政部周四表示，韩国将为农业和食品出口商准备支持措施，同时密切关注美国关税对该行业的影响。【原文：South Korea will prepare support measures for agricultural and food exporters, while closely monitoring the impact of U.S. tariffs on the sector, the finance ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: BPM 银行敦促联合信贷银行在无法满足政府要求时放弃竞标
item.description: 鉴于由首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 领导的 Banco BPM 银行已告知当局，该银行无法满足罗马为批准 BPM 收购所规定的条件，BPM 银行周四敦促收购方意大利联合信贷银行放弃收购要约。【原文：Banco BPM on Thursday urged suitor UniCredit to abandon its buyout offer, given the bank led by CEO Andrea Orcel has told authorities it cannot comply with the conditions Rome has imposed to authorise the BPM takeover.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，欧佩克+讨论在 7 月再次大幅增产
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，欧佩克+成员国正在讨论是否同意在6月1日的会议上再次大幅增产。【原文：OPEC+ members are discussing whether to agree on another large production increase at their meeting on June 1, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 力拓首席执行官斯陶霍尔姆将于 2025 年晚些时候卸任
item.description: 力拓（Rio Tinto）周四表示，首席执行官雅各布-斯陶霍尔姆（Jakob Stausholm）将于 2025 年晚些时候卸任。【原文：Rio Tinto on Thursday said Chief Executive Officer Jakob Stausholm will step down later in 2025.】

item.title: 出租方 SMBC 称波音和空客的产量取得了一些进展
item.description: 飞机租赁巨头 SMBC Aviation Capital 的负责人周四表示，波音公司和空中客车公司在促进飞机制造方面取得了进展，但要实现稳定、可预测的生产周期 "还有一段路要走"。【原文：Boeing and Airbus have made progress in boosting aircraft manufacturing, but there is "a way to go" to get a stable, predictable production cycle, the head of aircraft leasing giant SMBC Aviation Capital said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢首席执行官表示将重新聚焦核心业务
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引瑞士食品巨头雀巢公司首席执行官劳伦特-弗莱克西的话说，在涉足保健品等 "削弱了组织结构 "的细分市场后，雀巢正在重新专注于集团的核心业务。【原文：Swiss food giant Nestle is refocusing on the group's core business after straying into segments like health supplements that "weakened the fabric of the organisation," CEO Laurent Freixe was quoted as saying in the Financial Times on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道首席执行官：中美贸易休战或将减轻小松公司1.4亿美元的关税损失
item.description: 这家日本公司的首席执行官表示，利润下降的前景可能没有人们担心的那么糟糕。【原文：The Japanese company's CEO suggested its outlook for lower profits may not be as bad as feared.】

item.title: 投资者称任何中台冲突都无处藏身
item.description: 外国投资者曾经几乎无法想象中国会入侵邻国台湾，但随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）成为美国总统，许多人将其视为必须做好准备的尾部风险情景，尽管他们找不到这样做的方法。【原文：Foreign investors could once barely imagine that China would invade neighbouring Taiwan, but with Donald Trump as president of the United States, many view it as a tail-risk scenario they must prepare for, although they cannot find ways to do so.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根大通戴蒙警告美国存在滞胀风险
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，他不能排除美国经济将陷入滞胀的可能性，因为美国面临着地缘政治、赤字和物价压力等巨大风险。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co CEO Jamie Dimon said that he can’t rule out that the U.S. economy will fall into stagflation as the country faces huge risks from geopolitics, deficits and price pressures, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本对超长债券收益率上升的可能反应
item.description: 日本超长期国债收益率飙升至历史新高，因为减税和大笔支出的政治呼声日益高涨，吸引了投资者对该国财政困境的关注。【原文：Japan's super-long government bond yields have spiked to record highs, as mounting political calls for tax cuts and big spending draw investors' attention to the country's fiscal woes.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟对在特朗普关税一揽子方案中延长龙虾协议持开放态度
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引两位官员的话报道称，作为旨在取消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收的关税的更广泛方案的一部分，欧盟对延长给予美国龙虾免税准入的协议持开放态度。【原文：The European Union is open to extending a deal giving U.S. lobsters duty-free access as part of a broader package aimed at removing tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing two officials.】

item.title: 欧洲央行夏季暂停宽松周期的理由越来越充分
item.description: 欧洲中央银行预计将在 6 月再次降息，但由于经济状况好于预期，且通胀挑战开始逐渐显现，因此在 6 月之后暂停降息的可能性越来越大。【原文：The European Central Bank is expected to cut interest rates once again in June but the case is growing for a pause beyond that as the economy is holding up better than feared and an inflation challenge is starting to creep up on the horizon.】

item.title: 花旗银行为香港员工推出人工智能工具
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）周四表示，该公司为香港员工推出了一套人工智能（AI）工具--花旗人工智能（Citi AI）。【原文：Citigroup has launched Citi AI, a suite of artificial intelligence (AI) tools for its employees in Hong Kong, the bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国小米公司创始人预计新款电动 SUV 将于七月上市
item.description: 小米公司创始人兼首席执行官雷军周四在一条微博中表示，小米的新款电动 SUV YU7 预计将于 7 月份进入市场。【原文：Xiaomi's new electric SUV, the YU7, is expected to enter the market in July, founder and CEO Lei Jun said in a Weibo post on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲 在债券市场震荡之后，现在进行数据测试
item.description: Johann M Cherian 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Johann M Cherian】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人确定在黎明前投票，让特朗普税收法案顺利通过终点线
item.description: 共和党控制的美国众议院将在周四黎明前试图通过唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的大规模税收和支出法案，在此之前的几个星期，党内一直在就如何大幅削减开支存在分歧。【原文：The Republican-controlled U.S. House of Representatives will attempt to pass President Donald Trump's massive tax and spending bill in the pre-dawn hours of Thursday, following weeks of intra-party divisions of how deeply to cut spending.】

item.title: 联想集团第四财季利润下降 64
item.description: 中国联想集团周四报告称，第四季度利润下降了64%，主要原因是认股权证价值的非现金下降。【原文：China's Lenovo on Thursday reported a 64% decline in fourth-quarter profit, which it said was mostly due to a non-cash decline in the value of warrants.】

item.title: 波兰 Allegro 公司第一季度国内盈利增长 4.8%，确认前景展望
item.description: 波兰最大的电子商务平台 Allegro 周四公布，其国内第一季度盈利增长了 4.8%，并确认了全年业绩展望。【原文：Poland's biggest e-commerce platform Allegro on Thursday reported a 4.8% rise in its domestic first-quarter earnings and confirmed its full-year outlook.】

item.title: 高盛合并亚洲投资银行部门，任命德雷顿为亚太区主管
item.description: 据路透社周四查阅的一份备忘录显示，高盛正在将之前分别管理的三项亚洲投资银行业务整合为一个部门，以整合其区域交易咨询和资本市场能力。【原文：Goldman Sachs is bringing together previously separately-managed three Asian investment banking businesses into one unit to integrate its regional deals advice and capital market capabilities, according to a memo reviewed by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国财政前景堪忧，国债收益率上升，股市下跌
item.description: 周四，较长期限的美国国债收益率创下了 18 个月以来的新高，而亚洲股市和美元则出现下滑，原因是对全球最大经济体财政前景恶化的担忧影响了投资者的情绪。【原文：Longer-dated U.S. Treasury yields hit their highest in 18 months on Thursday, while Asian stocks and the dollar slipped as worries of a worsening fiscal outlook in the world's biggest economy weighed on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国专家组就新日铁与美国钢铁公司的交易向特朗普提交意见
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士称，一个强大的美国国家安全小组周三就新日铁以 149 亿美元竞购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）一事向唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提交了一份建议书，但未就建议书的内容提供更多细节。【原文：A powerful U.S. national security panel on Wednesday submitted a recommendation to President Donald Trump on Nippon Steel's fraught $14.9 billion bid for U.S. Steel , a person familiar with the matter said, without providing further detail on its contents.】

item.title: 日本央行决策者排除干预阻止债券收益率飙升的可能性
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员野口旭周四表示，他认为央行没有必要干预债券市场，以阻止近期超长期收益率的大幅上涨，并称这种走势 "迅速但不反常"。【原文：Bank of Japan board member Asahi Noguchi said on Thursday he saw no need for the central bank to intervene in the bond market to stem recent sharp rises in super-long yields, describing the moves as "rapid but not abnormal."】

item.title: 美元因财政忧虑而暴跌，比特币延续创纪录涨势
item.description: 周四，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统试图推动国会通过其全面的支出和减税法案之际，美国财政问题和不温不火的国债拍卖使美元兑日元汇率跌至两周低点。【原文：U.S. fiscal concerns and a tepid auction of Treasury bonds slapped the dollar to a two-week low versus the yen on Thursday, while President Donald Trump tried to push his sweeping spending and tax-cut bill through Congress.】

item.title: 美国库存意外增加导致油价下跌
item.description: 由于美国原油和燃料库存意外增加引发了对需求的担忧，油价周四有所回落，而投资者则保持谨慎，重点关注伊朗与美国重新开始的核谈判。【原文：Oil prices eased on Thursday as unexpected builds in U.S. crude and fuel inventories raised demand concerns, while investors stayed cautious, focusing on renewed Iran-U.S. nuclear talks.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-麦登（Steve Madden）起诉阿迪达斯，以挫败对鞋款设计的挑战
item.description: 以三条平行条纹鞋闻名的阿迪达斯周三被史蒂文-麦登（Steven Madden）告上法庭，称其试图阻止这家美国鞋业公司销售带有两条非平行条纹的时尚运动鞋。【原文：Adidas , known for shoes with three parallel stripes, was sued on Wednesday by Steven Madden over its alleged effort to stop the American shoe company from selling fashion sneakers with two non-parallel bands.】

item.title: 特朗普称正认真考虑将房利美和房地美上市
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，他将在近期就抵押贷款融资公司房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）上市一事做出决定，并称他正在 "非常认真地考虑 "这样做。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will make a decision in the near future about taking mortgage finance firms Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac public, saying that he is giving "very serious consideration" to doing so.】
